description: Fantom is a smart contract platform that intends to solve the scalability issues of existing public distributed ledger technologies. The Fantom platform adopts a new protocol known as the Lachesis Protocol to maintain consensus, which will be integrated into the current Fantom Opera Chain. The aim is to allow applications built on top of the Fantom Opera Chain to enjoy instant transactions and near zero transaction costs for all users.
